TAIWAN HIGHWAY BUREAU ROAD CONSTRUCTION TEAM 7 PARK ROAD. TAIPEI, TAIWAN TEL. 22692 33001
DATE.June .... 8, 1962
IN YOUR REPLY PLEASE REFER TO FILE NO.
+
Mr. C. C. Chang, Chief Second Division Council for United States Aid Taipei, Taiwan
Dear Mr. Chang:
We have reviewed the Excess Property Catalog in your office and found that two arc welders are in urgent need for our maintenance work. Please contact AID to take necessary action on P/SP.0.112.213.82
Your truly, E. 17. Fang. E. H. Fang Chief, R. C. T. T. H. B.
51.6. 9 11389 V.O.
SG. 2
CUSA
"
佳丽云
國史饭 Academia Historica
